text:
Happy New Year!! I hope everyone had great and restful holidays!

I have a user who is having some trouble with the mobile version of their website, specifically the mobile header image: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Video-in-Header-Movil/m-p/243160>. Any thoughts, suggestions or ideas would be greatly appreciated! :slightly_smiling_face:

<@UD53A9UUR> the video is in the body container in the first row available. Honestly, the video was uploaded to the file manager but it still shows it as a preview video so I am hoping they are just using it as a proof of concept and not using a placeholder from envato.
I swear I went through each dive looking for it. My eyes are fried
yea it took me like 3 tries to find it, i ended up viewing source and searching for a video tag or something like it
I think they just need a better way to go about it honestly
All my mind says right now is 'how do turn that into a pdf'
